attributes.long-description:
Test your reflexes with this awesome bundle from LOOT Interactive!

Included are three fast-paced, action games:
Electronic Super Joy (PS4™), Electronic Super Joy - Hot Sticky Mess DLC (PS4™), Velocibox (PS4™ and “PS Vita”), and Fluster Cluck (PS4)

Also included are two Dynamic Themes for PS4™:
Electronic Super Joy Dynamic Theme, and Velocibox Dynamic Theme

Electronic Super Joy:
1 player
118MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Electronic Super Joy - Hot Sticky Mess:
1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Velocibox:
1 player
65MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output

Fluster Cluck:
2-4 players
1GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Published by LOOT™ Interactive, LLC.
Electronic Super Joy © 2016 Michael Todd Games, All Rights Reserved.
Velocibox ©2015 Shawn Beck Games, All Rights Reserved.
FLUSTER CLUCK™ ©2014 LOOT™ Interactive.
attributes.name: LOOT™ Action-Packed Bundle
attributes.plus-reward-description: PlayStation®Plus members enjoy this item at a discounted price.

skus.name: Full Game and Add-On Content
